headline: Will Brown & Brown’s (BRO) Leadership Shuffle Reveal Its Edge in Integration and Operational Efficiency?
summary: In recent days, Brown & Brown announced updates to its Retail segment leadership team as part of its ongoing integration of Risk Strategies, appointing Mark Manzi as North American Retail Brokerage Leader to guide carrier relationships across multiple business lines. This leadership realignment signals a strong focus on unlocking new opportunities for collaboration and accelerating the scale of Brown & Brown's global business following its recent acquisition. This emphasis on experienced...
